name: Little Light (LittleLightGame, GeorgiaTolotti, caioguedes)
description:
Little light tells a simple story about a lost unknown creature while solving puzzles to find a way out.

Be the light on their path.

Controls (Highly recommended to play using a regular mouse):

  • Move mouse to move camera
  • Click and drag to draw light paths

This game was made during the 2020 GAMinG Jam, hosted by GAMinG, the Minas Gerais games association, based on Minas Gerais - Brazil.

Credits:

Caio Guedes - Game/Level design, Programming

Georgia Tolotti - 3D Art, 3D Animation, Concept Art
